name: Fall (itch) (atlinux)
description:
A defense game.

Instructions

  1. Defend your hexagon from the onslaught of falling blocks
  2. Gain points by surviving, or hitting the falling blocks into the highlighted side
  3. The falling speed of the blocks increase over time
  4. Once you reach a certain score, the falling speed is reset
  5. Survive for as long as you can and get the highest score

Written for the OneHourGameJam #157
